---
title: "plots"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
df <- read.csv("./symdecomp.csv")
df %>% ggplot(aes(ufit, vfit)) +
    geom_point(aes(color = iteration))
```

```{r}
df %>% ggplot(aes(ufit, vfit, color=factor(iteration))) + 
    facet_wrap(aes(group = iteration), nrow = 2) +
    geom_point()

df %>% ggplot(aes(ufit)) + 
    facet_wrap(aes(group = iteration), nrow = 2) +
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1)
```

```{r}
df %>% 
    group_by(iteration)
```
